Swipe.help: A fast Claw attack that shreds your opponent.
Swipe.targetHelp: A fast Claw attack that shreds your opponent.

Spin.help: The Crey Cloned Hero spins around with claws extended, slicing up all the nearby enemies.
Spin.targetHelp: The Crey Cloned Hero spins around with claws extended, slicing up all the nearby enemies.

Eviscerate.help: The Crey Cloned Hero spins and slashes around violently, attacking all nearby foes in a wide arc in front of him. Eviscerate is so deadly, that there is a chance of dealing extra damage!
Eviscerate.shortHelp: Melee Cone Lethal, Very High DMG, Special
Eviscerate.targetHelp: The Crey Cloned Hero spins and slashes around violently, attacking all nearby foes in a wide arc in front of him. Eviscerate is so deadly, that there is a chance of dealing extra damage!
Eviscerate.targetShortHelp: Melee Cone Lethal, Very High DMG, Special

Focus.help: The Crey Cloned Hero can project a burst of focused power. Focus only travels a short distance, but it can also knock down foes.
Focus.targetHelp: The Crey Cloned Hero can project a burst of focused power. Focus only travels a short distance, but it can also knock down foes.

Focused_Fighting.help: The Crey Cloned Hero can Focus his mind to evade many attacks.
Focused_Fighting.targetHelp: The Crey Cloned Hero can Focus his mind to evade many attacks.

Unstoppable.help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.shortHelp: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

messages.victimHit: Your {PowerName} power has left you exhausted.
